entry.title: The best airdrops are the ones no one is expecting, that are underfarmed and turn into massive growth stories post token launch. The worst ones are th...
entry.summary: The best airdrops are the ones no one is expecting, that are underfarmed and turn into massive growth stories post token launch. The worst ones are the projects everyone on ct and their dog are sybiling. Those are very often disappointing.
